carnival-adventure.name: Carnival Adventure
carnival-adventure.notes: Ex-Golden Princess/Pacific Adventure, transferred from P&O Australia 2025. VENUES MAY CHANGE as Carnival integrates ship.

carnival-encounter.name: Carnival Encounter
carnival-encounter.notes: Ex-Star Princess/Pacific Encounter, transferred from P&O Australia 2025. VENUES MAY CHANGE as Carnival integrates ship.

tss-mardi-gras-1972.name: TSS Mardi Gras
tss-mardi-gras-1972.notes: Carnival's founding ship. Ex-Empress of Canada. Ran aground on maiden voyage. Scrapped 2003.

ss-festivale-1978.name: SS Festivale
ss-festivale-1978.notes: Ex-Transvaal Castle. First Carnival ship with water slide. $30M refit 1978. Scrapped 2003 in Alang, India.

ms-tropicale-1982.name: MS Tropicale
ms-tropicale-1982.notes: Carnival's first purpose-built ship. First to feature iconic winged funnel by Joe Farcus. Scrapped 2021.

ms-holiday-1985.name: MS Holiday
ms-holiday-1985.notes: First of Holiday class. Sailed 24 years. Scrapped 2021 in Alang, India.

ms-jubilee-1986.name: MS Jubilee
ms-jubilee-1986.notes: Built in Sweden. Later became P&O Pacific Sun (2004), HNA Henna (2012). Scrapped 2017 in Alang, India.

ms-celebration-1987.name: MS Celebration
ms-celebration-1987.notes: Built in Sweden. Later Grand Celebration (Iberocruceros), Bahamas Paradise. Scrapped 2021 in Turkey.

carnival-destiny-1996.name: Carnival Destiny
carnival-destiny-1996.notes: First cruise ship over 100,000 GT. Renamed Carnival Sunshine in 2013 after major refurbishment.

carnival-triumph-1999.name: Carnival Triumph
carnival-triumph-1999.notes: Renamed Carnival Sunrise in 2019 after $200M renovation.

carnival-victory-2000.name: Carnival Victory
carnival-victory-2000.notes: Renamed Carnival Radiance in 2021 after major renovation.

carnival-ecstasy-1991.name: Carnival Ecstasy
carnival-ecstasy-1991.notes: First Fantasy-class ship. Retired October 2022. Scrapped in Turkey.

carnival-fascination-1994.name: Carnival Fascination
carnival-fascination-1994.notes: Retired July 2020 during COVID pandemic. Sold for scrap.

carnival-imagination-1995.name: Carnival Imagination
carnival-imagination-1995.notes: Retired July 2020 during COVID pandemic. Sold for scrap.

carnival-inspiration-1996.name: Carnival Inspiration
carnival-inspiration-1996.notes: Retired July 2020 during COVID pandemic. Sold for scrap.

carnival-fantasy-1990.name: Carnival Fantasy
carnival-fantasy-1990.notes: Name ship of Fantasy class. Retired July 2020 during COVID pandemic. First purpose-built mega-ship for Carnival.
